PasswordResult
This contains the results of checking the complexity of a given password - that is, how good of a password, how secure, is it? See RegistrationUtils.isPasswordGood(java.lang.String) for the calculation that generates this.
PasswordResultEnums
All the values currently possible for our assessment of a potential password
PersistenceLayer
 
RegisterServlet
Provides an API endpoint to register a new user, recording their username and (a hash of their) password
RegistrationResult
This class holds detailed data on the results of trying to register a new user.
RegistrationStatusEnums
All the values possible for the results of an attempted registration
RegistrationUtils
Provides logic for registering a new user
